meanings.definition: A plant of the pea family, native to California.
meanings.sent1: The deerweed grew tall in the California sun.
meanings.sent2: I saw a deerweed plant while hiking in California.
meanings.sent3: Why did the deerweed plant go to school? To get a little 'pea' education!
meanings.sent4: The deerweed plant stood proudly among its pea family members.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the deerweed plant caught my eye on the trail.

meanings.sent1: A deerweed can provide shelter for small animals.
meanings.sent2: The deerweed in the garden is blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The deerweed plant told a joke to the flowers, making them giggle.
meanings.sent4: The deerweed plant danced gracefully in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the deerweed filled the air in the garden.
